alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Dickinson; Gogebic; Iron; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 30 at 10:37PM EDT until April 01 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT /10 AM CDT/ FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. The snow will become mixed with sleet and freezing rain late in the night and Friday morning across southern portions of Upper Michigan. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow and mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central Upper and western Upper Michigan. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ this evening to 11 AM EDT /10 AM CDT/ Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow Friday night through Saturday morning could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact multiple commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Dickinson; Gogebic; Iron; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
